tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gamification_data (
    user_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    points INT,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    source VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_scores (
  user_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  score INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, game_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    platform_id INT,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE game_scores (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    score INT,
    level INT,
    play_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE achievement_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    achievement_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE gamification_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    platform_id INT NOT NULL,
    registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE gamification_scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    score INT NOT NULL,
    level_number INT,
    score_date DATE
);
